name: grad_project
description: Graduate student tracker for UNC CS department

scripts.devAsAdmin: cross-env mode=development model=Faculty ONYEN=admin firstName=admin lastName=admin PID=999999999 active=true admin=true node bin/www
scripts.devAsFaculty: cross-env mode=development model=Faculty ONYEN=faculty firstName=faculty lastName=faculty PID=888888888 active=true admin=false node bin/www
scripts.devAsStudent: cross-env mode=development model=Student ONYEN=student firstName=student lastName=student PID=777777777 active=true node bin/www
scripts.testAsAdmin: npm run db:reset & cross-env mode=testing model=Faculty ONYEN=admin firstName=admin lastName=admin PID=999999999 active=true admin=true node bin/www
scripts.testAsFaculty: npm run db:reset & cross-env mode=testing model=Student ONYEN=student firstName=student lastName=student PID=777777777 active=true node bin/www
